review: They definitely get more than 5 stars. By far the best law office. My car accident was extremely stressful and scary!! Aaron made my experience as good as I could be, based off of the circumstances. Great communication every step of the way. Aaron cared about making sure I was taken care of and settled quickly. I wouldn't recommend going anywhere else.
